title: #ICYMI - Ask a Sports Engineer, with David James
description:
In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel… Gary O’Reilly and Chuck Nice answer your questions and investigate the collision of sports, technology, and engineering alongside David James, sports engineer and Director of Photo Credit: The Center for Sports Engineering Research at Sheffield Hallam University.

author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
